credit_line: Gift of Mrs. Howard J. Sachs and Mr. Peter G. Sachs in memory of Miss Edith L. Sachs
title: Candelabra
description: Porcelain Chinoiserie figure of a young boy dressed in a yellow robe with flowered shawl, wearing a leaf cap and pink slippers, prancing beneath an ormolu bell-hung canopy on rustic supports; the base fitted with two scrolling enleafed candle arms bearing porcelain flowers.
name: Candelabra
